text: A file was shared
Seriously one of the best things I've ever seen in sports
if for no other reason that it made me actually wonder "wait, is Stevenson actually mentally ill?"
but then I realized: if the pacers lose, no one will ever remember this moment
but if they win, then it will be the "blow of death"
I hadn't seen this yet.   Seriously amazing
I cant stop laughing
more than anything in the world I want Tim Duncan to do this to Russell Westbrook tonight
pacers win 100% of games when stevenson blows seductively into lebron’s ear
right?
its a thing now
he’d be silly not to do it next game
oh - no - he HAS to. Because if he doesn't, and they lose, he'll be forced to go the rest of life wondering "what if..."
I think ear blowing has over taken this for me now:
A file was shared
haha
ear blowing gets major points for originality
yeah - it's old school crazy. It's ron artest crazy
but also thoroughly original
Do you think he burped before blowing?
ew
no. Stevenson is an artist.
right, cause the burp makes it frat house - and clearly stevenson is way more layered and deep than that...
clearly
Stevenson is the Lars von Trier of the NBA: insane? Possibly. But an artist by any definition.
the line between genius and insanity is very fine...

he's elevated the role of "wildcard" to a whole new status. It's to the point where I was reading an article from an analyst today who was genuinely confounded as to whether stevenson was the only thing that could get the pacers to the finals, or the single thing holding them back, or both, or neither. Im pretty sure he was crying as he wrote the article
